document_data.name: The Wanderers Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wanderers Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Wanderers''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|22}}
document_data.Activities: The Wanderers were the only naval mamluk organization in Zakhara.
document_data.Organization: The Wanderers were led by Admiral [[Dus Abd al-Dawwar]].
document_data.Base of Operations: Only a few supporters of this organization were found in [[Qudra]].
